MAIN_MESSAGE: This is a message for customers in the ML11 postcode area of Lanark. It was necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 9:00am due to repair work required on our overhead line network and this may be affecting the supply to your property. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of further work required and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 4:00pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 2:52pm on 17th November 2020.
